trait.bigGamePlayer: Proven track record in finals and crucial matches earned the 'Big Game Player' trait.
trait.clinicalFinisher: A lethal season in front of goal earned the 'Clinical Finisher' trait.
trait.composure: Ice-cold mentality in pressure situations earned the 'Composure' trait.
trait.discipline: Exemplary conduct on the pitch earned the 'Discipline' trait.
trait.dribblingWizard: Mesmerizing dribbling displays earned the 'Dribbling Wizard' trait.
trait.engine: Relentless work rate all season earned the 'Engine' trait.
trait.injuryProne: A concerning injury history has resulted in the 'Injury Prone' trait.
trait.injuryProneLost: Dedicated fitness work has overcome previous injury concerns.
trait.leadership: Developed into a natural leader, earning the 'Leadership' trait.
trait.oneClubMan: Became a true club legend, earning the 'One-Club Man' trait after years of loyal service.
trait.playmaker: Orchestrated attacks all season long, earning the 'Playmaker' trait.
trait.powerHeader: Aerial dominance throughout the season earned the 'Power Header' trait.
trait.setpieceSpecialist: Mastery of dead-ball situations earned the 'Set-piece Specialist' trait.
trait.speedMerchant: Blistering pace has become their trademark, earning the 'Speed Merchant' trait.
trait.twoFooted: Years of practice have perfected their weaker foot, gaining the 'Two-Footed' trait.
trait.versatile: Years of playing different roles earned the 'Versatile' trait.
trait.weakFootLost: Practice has significantly improved their weaker foot.

contractTermination.alreadyTerminatedDesc: You have already terminated a contract this season. Contract termination is limited to once per season to maintain career stability.

contractTermination.warningLessInterest: Lebih sedikit klub akan menunjukkan minat
contractTermination.warningLowerWages: Klub akan menawarkan gaji 25% lebih rendah

assists.1: Krisis kreativitas? Tidak ada assist dalam 5 pertandingan.
assists.2: Di mana bola terakhir? Playmaker kesulitan.

goals.1: Paceklik gol berlanjut: 5 pertandingan tanpa mencetak gol.
goals.2: Striker tumpul: Apakah kepercayaan diri masalahnya?
goals.3: Sepuluh pertandingan, nol gol. Krisis untuk nomor 9.

neg.1: "Needs to decide in big games" Ã¢â‚¬â€ fans want more decisive actions.
neg.2: End product below expected Ã¢â‚¬â€ consistency in question.
neg.3: Apakah peran {style} ideal? Debat memanas di antara penggemar.

neu.1: Solid season Ã¢â‚¬â€ reliable presence at {team}.
neu.2: "Underrated without the ball" Ã¢â‚¬â€ pressure and support stand out.
neu.3: Produksi konstan: {goals} G, {assists} A. Langkah selanjutnya: naluri pembunuh.

pos.1: Fans already call him an idol Ã¢â‚¬â€ delivery and intensity high.
pos.2: "Pelajaran lain dalam {style}." Rating rata-rata {rating} berbicara sendiri.
pos.3: Crowd says he's carrying the {team} Ã¢â‚¬â€ {gpg} G/90, {apg} A/90.

shots.1: Makes numbers against weak teams Ã¢â‚¬â€ disappears when it matters.
shots.2: All hype, little impact Ã¢â‚¬â€ numbers deceive.
shots.3: Overrated Ã¢â‚¬â€ system player who doesn't carry the team.
shots.4: Header or thigh goals â€” no class at all.
shots.5: Hurts to watch â€” terrible technical level.
shots.6: Not worth half what they paid â€” complete flop.
shots.7: Stats inflated by easy games â€” real test will expose.

neg.1: Question impact in big games Ã¢â‚¬â€ aggressive marking neutralizes him.
neg.2: Keraguan tentang keberlanjutan tanpa meningkatkan kualitas peluang.
neg.3: Analysts concerned about lack of progression.
neg.4: Season below expectations â€” evident regression.
neg.5: Technical limitations exposed at high level.

neu.1: Komentator melihat pertumbuhan konstan; batas atas tergantung keputusan di sepertiga akhir.
neu.2: Analis taktis: eksekusi benar; keuntungan marjinal bisa membuka level lain.
neu.3: Good player â€” lacks that special something to be a star.
neu.4: Solid numbers but no decisive impact.
neu.5: Reliable professional â€” doesn't excite or disappoint.

pos.1: Commentators highlight movement and timing Ã¢â‚¬â€ looks like a complete {position}.
pos.2: Analis menunjuk pemilihan tembakan dan penciptaan peluang di level elite.
pos.3: Great game reading â€” always in the right position.
pos.4: Quick and precise decisions â€” smart player.
pos.5: Model of consistency â€” rarely makes mistakes.

narrativeChange.OntheRise: Naratif media berubah menjadi: 'On the Rise'

ComebackKid.description: Membuat comeback impresif setelah menghadapi kemunduran atau form buruk.
ComebackKid.name: Raja Comeback
ComebackKid.quote1: How does it feel to be back at the top after so many doubts?
ComebackKid.quote2: The fans never stopped believing. What does their support mean to you?
ComebackKid.quote3: Is this the start of a second peak for your career?

CultHero.description: Dicintai penggemar karena kepribadian dan koneksi dengan klub.
CultHero.name: Pahlawan Kultus
CultHero.quote1: The connection you have with this club is unique. Can you explain it?
CultHero.quote2: You've become a symbol for the fans. Does that add extra pressure?
CultHero.quote3: What makes this particular club feel like home for you?

EstablishedStar.description: Pemain terbukti yang secara konsisten tampil di level tertinggi.
EstablishedStar.name: Bintang Mapan
EstablishedStar.quote1: As one of the league's top stars, what are your goals this season?
EstablishedStar.quote2: Many young players look up to you. How do you handle that role?
EstablishedStar.quote3: Do you feel any extra pressure to perform in the big games?

Flop.description: Gagal memenuhi ekspektasi dan menghadapi kritik signifikan.
Flop.name: Gagal
Flop.quote1: Critics have been harsh. Do you feel you've had a fair chance?
Flop.quote2: What would you say to those who labeled you a transfer failure?
Flop.quote3: How are you working to turn your fortunes around at the club?

ForgottenMan.description: Berjuang untuk membuat dampak dan kesempatan terbatas.
ForgottenMan.name: Orang yang Terlupakan
ForgottenMan.quote1: It's been a while since we've seen you on the pitch. How are you feeling?
ForgottenMan.quote2: Do you feel you still have a future under this management?
ForgottenMan.quote3: Are you considering a move to get more playing time elsewhere?

HometownHero.description: Ikon lokal yang ikatannya dengan basis penggemar mengangkat klub.
HometownHero.name: Pahlawan Lokal
HometownHero.quote1: Representing your hometown must be special. How is the feeling?
HometownHero.quote2: You're a role model for local kids. What is your message to them?
HometownHero.quote3: Do you see yourself staying here for the long term?

InjuryComeback.description: Berjuang kembali dari cederaâ€”ketahanan dan lintasan diawasi.
InjuryComeback.name: Kembali dari Cedera
InjuryComeback.quote1: It's been a long recovery. How physically ready do you feel?
InjuryComeback.quote2: What was the hardest part about being away from the pitch?
InjuryComeback.quote3: Are you taking extra precautions to avoid another setback?

Journeyman.description: Pemain berpengalaman yang telah bermain untuk banyak klub sepanjang kariernya.
Journeyman.name: Pengembara
Journeyman.quote1: You've played in many places. How do you adapt so quickly?
Journeyman.quote2: What's the most valuable lesson you've learned from your travels?
Journeyman.quote3: Are you looking for more stability, or do you enjoy the variety?

OntheRise.description: Diidentifikasi sebagai salah satu prospek paling panas di liga.
OntheRise.name: Sedang Naik Daun
OntheRise.quote1: Your performance has caught everyone's eye. How are you handling the hype?
OntheRise.quote2: Many big clubs are reportedly watching you. Does that distract you?
OntheRise.quote3: What's the next step in your development as a player?

PolarizingFigure.description: Membagi pendapatâ€”momen cemerlang dan momen frustrasi.
PolarizingFigure.name: Figur Kontroversial
PolarizingFigure.quote1: You seem to split opinion. Why do you think that is?
PolarizingFigure.quote2: Does the criticism you receive affect your game at all?
PolarizingFigure.quote3: Do you feel misunderstood by the media and the public?

PressDarling.description: Magnet berita utamaâ€”karisma dan daya jual dipamerkan.
PressDarling.name: Kesayangan Media
PressDarling.quote1: The media seems to love you. Does that help your confidence?
PressDarling.quote2: You're always in the headlines for good reasons. What's the secret?
PressDarling.quote3: How important is it for a player to maintain a good image?

Prodigy.description: Bakat muda dengan potensi luar biasa, sudah membuat gebrakan di dunia sepak bola.
Prodigy.name: Anak Ajaib
Prodigy.quote1: Being called a 'prodigy' at such a young ageâ€”how does it feel?
Prodigy.quote2: Expectations are sky-high. Can you live up to the 'generational' label?
Prodigy.quote3: What is your main focus as you start this promising career?

SystemPlayer.description: Berkembang dalam struktur; kontribusi melebihi angka mentah.
SystemPlayer.name: Pemain Sistem
SystemPlayer.quote1: You fit this system perfectly. Are you worried about other tactics?
SystemPlayer.quote2: Some say you only look this good because of the setup. Reactions?
SystemPlayer.quote3: Can you adapt your game if the manager changes the approach?

UnderPressure.description: Menghadapi kritik dan perlu meningkatkan permainan untuk membuktikan para skeptis salah.
UnderPressure.name: Di Bawah Tekanan
UnderPressure.quote1: Performances haven't been at your usual level. What's going on?
UnderPressure.quote2: The fans are starting to get restless. Do you feel you're being treated fairly?
UnderPressure.quote3: How do you plan to silence the critics in the upcoming matches?

VeteranLeader.description: Sosok yang dihormati di ruang ganti dengan pengalaman bertahun-tahun.
VeteranLeader.name: Pemimpin Veteran
VeteranLeader.quote1: Your experience is vital for this young squad. How do you lead them?
VeteranLeader.quote2: How much longer do you see yourself playing at this high level?
VeteranLeader.quote3: What is the most important advice you give to the young players?

VeteranRotation.description: Veteran berpengalaman yang memberikan kedalaman skuad dan kepemimpinan dalam rotasi.
VeteranRotation.name: Rotasi Veteran
VeteranRotation.quote1: Anda telah pindah ke peran rotasi. Bagaimana Anda menjaga ketajaman di antara pertandingan?
VeteranRotation.quote2: Pengalaman Anda sangat vital bagi skuad. Bagaimana Anda membantu para pemain muda?
VeteranRotation.quote3: Apakah Anda senang dengan peran Anda saat ini, atau Anda masih merasa harus menjadi starter?

VeteranStar.description: Veteran elit yang terus memberikan performa level bintang.
VeteranStar.name: Bintang Veteran
VeteranStar.quote1: Anda masih tampil lebih baik dari pemain yang usianya setengah dari Anda. Apa rahasia umur panjang Anda?
VeteranStar.quote2: Banyak yang mengira Anda akan menurun, namun Anda justru memainkan sepak bola terbaik Anda. Bagaimana caranya?
VeteranStar.quote3: Sebagai bintang veteran, apakah Anda merasa lebih bertanggung jawab di momen-momen besar?

confident.fan1: Itulah kepercayaan diri yang kita butuhkan! ğŸ’ª
